June 18, 1949 D Scottish Unionist Contest
Scottish Unionist Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
scottish-unionist-contest
None
Dalkeith Palace Grounds, Midlothian, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - 1stCity of Edinburgh, 2nd Galashiels Town. Best section 3 band - 1st Bowhill Colliery, 2nd Whitburn Miners. Best section 4 band - 1st Dumbarton Burgh, 2nd Renton. March contest - 1st Tullis Russell, 2nd Clydebank. 13 bands competed.
Feb. 12, 2014, 12:51 p.m. March 1, 2019, 10:36 a.m.
